news.title: Misogyny is an epidemic fuelled by social media, Amy Hunt tells BBC in first interview
news.summary: People “should be very concerned” about sexist, hateful content on social media, says Amy, whose mother and two sisters were murdered last year.

news.title: Starmer considers welfare concessions in rebel MP talks
news.summary: The prime minister said talks would continue in the "coming days" ahead of a vote on changes to the welfare system next week.

news.title: How Starmer changed his tone in attempt to win back MPs
news.summary: The prime minster and his team are trying to repair relations with backbenchers over welfare cuts.

news.title: Child Q strip-search officers sacked by Met Police
news.summary: The girl, who was wrongly suspected of possessing cannabis, was searched by police at her school.

news.title: Iran leader says US gained nothing from strikes as Hegseth hails 'historic success'
news.summary: The ayatollah speaks for the first time since the conflict ended, as the US insists Iran's nuclear sites are destroyed.

news.title: Weight loss jabs study begins after hundreds report pancreas issues
news.summary: There have been hundreds of cases of acute pancreatitis in people who have also taken Mounjaro, Ozempic and Wegovy.

news.title: Two seriously injured as bus carrying college students 'careers into river'
news.summary: Five people, including the driver, were taken to hospital for treatment after the bus crash.

news.title: Pound hits near four-year high as Trump rattles dollar
news.summary: A report that the US President could name the new head of the central bank early raises concerns over its independence.

news.title: Kim Kardashian 'grandpa robber' dies month after trial ends
news.summary: Didier Dubreucq, 69 years old, was diagnosed with lung cancer while in detention.

news.title: 'My stoma won't stop me enjoying Glastonbury'
news.summary: TikToker Lucy Smith-Butler says she hopes her top tips will help other disabled festival-goers too.
